Support IWM

Donate with

Any gift we receive makes a vital contribution to our ongoing work, from conserving our collection to supporting our public programme.

Current location

Opposite St Mary's Church

Village Green

Junction of School Lane (B5194) and Knowsley Lane (BB5202)

Knowsley

Knowsley

OS Grid Ref: SJ 43436 95959

Denomination: Undefined

View location on Google Maps

Description

Stylised potent sandstone cross with the rose of Lancaster carved at the crossing, on a tapered shaft set on a battered plinth on a two-stepped base within a brick paved area on the village green. The incised inscription was gilded, but this has faded. (2022).

Inscription

In Grateful Remembrance/ of/ the Men of this Parish/ who Gave their Lives/ for their Country/ in the/ Great War/ 1914-1918/ And World War 1939-1945

Inscription legible?

yes
